price: 8 Ceux qui auront cru et accompli de bonnes œuvres seront, quant à eux, admis dans les Jardin des délices
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātu al-naʿīmi
